duties_responsibilities.duty: Devise strategic and tactical solutions to meet overall business objectives in conjunction with Information Technology Managers.
Recommend technology solutions considering budget, business need, internal capabilities, and strategic direction.
Participate in projects needing new application, modification to existing applications, application updates, testing, and software integration.
Design or review new and existing application systems, perform complex systems analysis, and make recommendations for integration or modifications as required.
Integrate computer systems with different operating systems and file formats, write interface programs when necessary.
Ensure coding standards are consistent among internally developed applications and define application program interfaces to the database.
Write, debug, document, and implement solutions to complex problems using the appropriate application systems access and database tools.
Work with vendors and staff to document and specify software functional requirements, establish policies and procedures for loading application systems, and maintain security and integrity controls.
Review contracts, monitor systems performance, and recommend methods for improving efficiency through system and application design.
Attend professional opportunities to maintain expertise and provide or participate in user training.
Perform other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Computer Engineering, or a related field
